title: An Approach Towards Multilingual Translation By Semantic-Based Verb Identification And Root Word Analysis

yaml.title: An Approach Towards Multilingual Translation By Semantic-Based Verb Identification And Root Word Analysis
yaml.description: This study explores a generalized machine translation system for low-resource languages like Bengali, proposing semantic-based verb identification and root word detection algorithms that outperform Google Translator, while comparing various approaches in terms of accuracy, time, and space complexity.
